009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
012import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
013
014/**
015 * Common interface for Kuwahara filter implementations.
016 * 
017 * @author WB
018 */
019public interface KuwaharaF {
020        
021        /**
022         * Parameter bundle for Kuwahara filters (implementations of {@link KuwaharaF}).
023         */
024        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<KuwaharaF> {
025                
026                /** Radius of the filter (should be even) */
027                @DialogLabel("Radius of the filter (>1)")
028                public int radius = 2;
029                
030                /** Threshold on sigma to avoid banding in flat regions */
031                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold 0,..,10")
032                public double tsigma = 5.0;
033                
034        }
035
036}
